replies.author: 新之助~
replies.txt_content:
标题: 【OOC】矿石怪物MOD1.8 本帖最后由 新之助~ 于 2016-12-20 22:52 编辑 




介绍



灵感来自于BlackCB大大教程帖
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=632486复制代码让矿物会动8种矿物
缺点：会有粒子效果



命令



/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Tile:152,Time:10,Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~-27 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~2 ~-12 ~6 {Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-12 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-11 ~10 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-10 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-9 ~9 {}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-8 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=quartz_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:quartz_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=redstone_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:redstone_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-7 ~8 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=emerald_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:emerald_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=lapis_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:lapis_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-6 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=coal_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:coal_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=gold_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:gold_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-5 ~7 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=iron_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:iron_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[type=Bat,name=diamond_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:\\"Grumm\\",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:\\"minecraft:diamond_ore\\"}]}"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~3 ~-4 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/execute @e[score_tnt_min=2] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[type=Bat]"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~ ~4 redstone_block 0"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"summon FallingSand ~1 ~-3 ~6 {id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard players add @e[type=Bat] tnt 1"},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~1 ~ ~4 stone 0"},Riding:{}}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~1 ~-2 ~6 ~3 ~-1 ~10 air 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~1 ~5 ~4 ~1 ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~2 ~11 stained_glass 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~5 ~4 ~ ~11 quartz_block 0"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~4 wall_sign 1 replace {Text1:"{text:\\"关闭系统\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text2:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text3:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}",Text4:"{text:\\"\\",bold:False,italic:False,underlined:False,strikethrough:False,color:black,clickEvent:{action:run_command,value:\\"fill ~2 ~-1 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~8 air\\"}}"}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"quartz_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"emerald_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"redstone_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"lapis_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"coal_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"iron_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"gold_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"diamond_ore"}}"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/scoreboard objectives add tnt dummy"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 redstone_block"},Riding:{id:"FallingSand",Tile:137,Time:10,TileEntityData:{Command:"fill ~ ~ ~ ~ ~31 ~1 air"}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码


教程




关闭信息
/gamerule commandBlockOutput false.
创建一个叫tnt的计分板
/scoreboard objectives add tnt dummy
给我一个叫diamond_ore的蝙蝠刷怪蛋
/give @a spawn_egg 1 65 {display:{Name:"diamond_ore"}}
给蝙蝠刷分
/scoreboard players add @e[type=Bat] tnt 1
tnt分数大于2的杀死
/execute @e[score_tnt_min=2] ~ ~ ~ kill @e
/execute @e[type=Bat,name=diamond_ore] ~ ~ ~ summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {NoAI:1,Riding:{id:Slime,Size:0.1,Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}]},CustomName:"Grumm",Silent:1,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,ShowParticles:0b,Duration:999999}],Equipment:[{},{},{},{},{id:"minecraft:diamond_ore"}]}

探测到一只叫diamond_ore的蝙蝠生成一只隐身的骷髅骑在史莱姆上面在他头上发一个方块就好了






@大法




@Dear丶小若 @FHC红石 @lishanglin @quangegegege @籽岷 @langyo
